name: Re(wind)verse
description:
Re(wind)verse is a game where you will have to try to avoid falling down into the abyss. The car you are in has a special feature called"reversing" which can also be seen as a way to go back in time. Use left click to begin reversing, click again to stop. But you have to keep an eye on the "Rewind-bar" in the top left corner, because if that bar reaches 0, the rewinding will stop.

I Have only done gamedev for about 4 months, so don't expect anything crazy
